input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System

Item keywords:
Fits Universal 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars
Works with Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars
Chrome Finished Round Rail Style Peg Design
Sold as a Pair
input_text.Response A: The Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System is a great way to add style and functionality to your motorcycle.  These highway pegs feature a durable chrome finish and a stylish round rail design, and they install easily on most motorcycle highway bars.  They also include rubber grip pads for added comfort, and they're sold as a pair.  These highway pegs are a great way to increase the comfort and functionality of your motorcycle, and they're sure to turn heads with their stylish design.
input_text.Response B: This pair of round rail style pegs is designed to work with Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars (sold separately). The pegs are finished with chrome coating for a stylish look. The design allows for the mounting of accessories such as lights, mirrors, and queuing signs. The pegs are designed to fit a universal 1-1/4 inch highway bar.
